se.ltu.android.demo.scene.animation
Interface AnimationListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
DemoGameThread
public interface AnimationListener

Any class that want to able to listen to changes on an animation should implement this interface and then register itself on the animations setListener() method.

Version:
$Revision: 24 $
